function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper HVAC system maintenance and operation","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and reduced air quality","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of HVAC system, proper operation checks, and filter replacement","Technologies":"Smart HVAC systems with air quality monitoring, UV-C light air purifiers, and high-efficiency filters","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, facility managers","Owner":"Facility managers, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Inadequate control of HVAC system fan","Impact":"Reduced local dilution of airborne particles and potential spread of airborne diseases","Mitigation":"Regular checks to ensure the system fan is set to 'On' or 'Circulate' when occupants are present, proper air grille maintenance","Technologies":"Smart HVAC controls with occupancy detection, constant air movement systems","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, facility managers","Owner":"Facility managers, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Improper indoor temperature range in HVAC system","Impact":"Uncomfortable indoor environment and potential impact on occupants' health","Mitigation":"Set and maintain indoor temperature range within recommended limits, use of smart thermostats and temperature control systems","Technologies":"Smart thermostats, temperature sensors, zone control systems","People":"Building occupants, facility managers","Owner":"Facility managers, maintenance staff"}]}
